column4: hey felllas, which is the repository that has the DVD playback in it?
I should just add all of these shouldnt I
now comment out marillat and apt-get update again.
now try and play a dvd
same thing.  it just uses the xine backend rather than the default gstreamer.
sure.  make notes! for your next reinstallation if needed.  and for when you help other peopl out. :-)
well, you're all set up on the media front. :-)
